column2:
Generations ago, a fox spirit took interest in one of my ancestors. To better understand my ancestor, the spirit used it's vast power to take a physical form. 
  A child was born of their union, and within her was a portion of the Kitsune's spiritual essence. Every once in a while a child would be born who resonated with the spiritual world, awakening within them something that makes them more Kitsune than human. 
  I am one such child. While I've risen over time to find myself lording over my own lands, there is a danger stalking me from the shadows. I know not if it is beast or man. I only know that my parents warned me to beware the Hound. 
  Past ancestors had fallen prey to this hunter. It's said that the Hound has the ability to feed on the Kitsune essence within, and as such, I must be wary.
I shall not become prey to the Hound.
